name: Power of life
description:
Life is dying,  help our little friend to escape all the deadly traps !

You'll have to finish 15 levels in this platformer in witch you'll need to power blocks to open your way out of the level. 

Controls : 

- Use arrows to move.
- Space to jump.
- Shift to lower your gravity.
- Ctrl to activate green blocks.

Hope you'll enjoy the game.
